reviewText: Its revelations go FAR beyond its mere stated subject matter, and is imperative knowledge for everyone.  Particularly at this very present season.

I was blown away by the book of the same title & the DVD is a fantastic followup. I placed the order on Friday & had it in hand by Monday. Would certainly recommend Your Future Books to anyone for their great customer service & timely handling of this order. Thanks!!
There's just no reason anyone should be suffering & dying of cancer except that they got this info too late.

This DVD is filled with the mumbo-jumbo goobledygook pseudo-science that may trick the ignorant into believing that this is a way to cure cancer.  It isn't.  Not one person using the products described in the DVD has ever been cured of cancer.  Sadly, desperate people with serious medical problems are often the most gullible.
If I got cancer I would not take standard treatment, but I would follow this program instead.

I'm really mad. How can this item be even temporarily unavailable?! Whoever sells this, listen to me! Now it's your duty to keep this DVD in stock and available at all times, because this is the biggest life saver ever!!! I bought it before and whenever I meet a cancer patient, I show it to them. But others need access to it, too! So please, keep selling it! Get more, print more, copy more DVDs!

Now to potential customers, who did a search and came to this page on Amazon: Please, write to this seller and to Amazon and ask them to provide more of this DVD! Never let it be out of order again! This is a service of conscience, to have it here for anybody, who needs it, at all times! This is a matter of responsibility! So urge them (Amazon & the seller) on this basis to have this item permanently available, as long as Amazon exists!

And one more thing, if you're a cancer patient and haven't watched this DVD and haven't read the book with the same title (World without Cancer), you haven't done ANYTHING in your own best interest to survive! This DVD and this book is a MUST and a MINIMUM, do you understand? So don't just sit there making faces, but right now go and type in "World without Cancer" under Books on Amazon.com and order at least that, read it to the very last page and keep demanding the availability of this DVD!

Yes, people, that's how good it is! It's not just, not just the best, it's absolutely essential to life!!!

Laszlo
[...]

In my opinion, everyone should have all the people they care about sit down and watch this video with them.  In less than five years I've buried eight friends and family.  One died from an aneurysm and the rest from cancer.  All seven were gone within two years of diagnosis and "treatment."  As adults, we all need to be able to make informed decisions about how we live.  This video could literally mean the difference between life or death.  Although I intend to purchase the book that is the companion to this video, in today's world you stand a better chance of passing on the information by getting someone to watch a DVD with you than lending them a book and hoping they will actually read it.
Very happy, this book has helped myself and numerous friends.
Wow. This is the one dvd that should be in ones collection. This dvd will connect all those dots you have wanted to connect.
Very informative, the DVD was very good and had no problems. I just wish I knew about it sooner!
